SEARCH
Package application

Class User

java.lang.Object
application.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Staff, Student
public abstract class User extends Object
Superclass intended to be used in CAMs interface. Methods and variables whose behaviour is independent of the User type are defined here.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String name, String id, String faculty, String password)
      Called by subclasses on construction. Relevant usage in DataHandler.getUsers().
      Parameters:
      name - Given name of user.
      id - Unique identifier of user.
      faculty - String identifier of user faculty.
      password - SHA-256 hash value of password.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Fetches the name of the User
      Returns:
      String of the user's name

    • getID

      public String getID()
      Fetches the userID of the User
      Returns:
      String of the userID

    • getFaculty

      public String getFaculty()
      Fetches the faculty of the User
      Returns:
      String of the Faculty the User belongs to

    • getPassword

      public String getPassword()
      Used to write the hashes back to save the program state.
      Returns:
      The hash of the user's password.

    • hash

      public String hash(String password)
      Boilerplate code to avoid storing passwords in plaintext in the .csv files.
      Parameters:
      password - Plaintext String of password intended to be hashed.
      Returns:
      Hashed String intended to be stored. If an Exception happens it will return the default password, but should be exceedingly rare.

    • matchPass

      public boolean matchPass(String attempt)
      Used in login to authenticate the password. Calls User.hash() to generate the hash for the attempt to match with the stored hashed value.
      Parameters:
      attempt - Plaintext String of the attempted password.
      Returns:
      Boolean whether the attempt is the correct password.

    • checkForDefaultPass

      public void checkForDefaultPass(List<User> userList)
      Called after a login. If the current password matches the hash for "password", the user is assumed to be new and is prompted to change their password.
      Parameters:
      userList - List of all users. Required to pass to changePass() to save user data in event of a password change.

    • changePass

      public void changePass(List<User> userList)
      Called when user requests or after checkForDefaultPass() finds a default password.
      Asks user for current password, then a new password.
      Current password must be correct.
      New password is hashed then stored in User.password
      After this is called, DataHandler.saveUsers() is called to update program state.
      Parameters:
      userList - List of all User objects to save program state.

    • printMenu

      public abstract void printMenu(List<Camp> campList)
      Used to determine and generate the menu of options in CAMs. Overriden by Student and Staff.

    • viewCamps

      public abstract void viewCamps(List<Camp> campList, List<Enquiry> enquiryList)
      Used to generate the list of camps that should be visible to the user. Overriden by Student and Staff.
      Parameters:
      campList - List of all Camp objects.

    • viewOwnedCamps

      public abstract void viewOwnedCamps(List<Camp> campList, List<Signup> signupList, List<User> userList)
      Used to view the list of camps where the User can meaningfully interact with. Behaviour changes based on whether the User is a Student or Staff. Overriden by Student and Staff.
      Parameters:
      campList - List of all Camp objects.
      signupList - List of all Signup objects
      userList - List of all User objects

    • resolveCAMsMenu

      public abstract application.SessionStatus resolveCAMsMenu(int choice, String argument, List<User> userList, List<Camp> campList, List<Signup> signupList, List<Enquiry> enquiryList, List<Suggestion> suggestionList)
      Method to determine functionality for each choice. Overriden by Student and Staff.
      Parameters:
      choice - Input integer choice for menu
      argument - Any additional string arguments (used for Camp filters)
      userList - List of all User objects. Passed to other classes.
      campList - List of all Camp objects. Passed to other classes.
      signupList - List of all Signup objects. Passed to other classes.
      enquiryList - List of all Enquiry objects. Passed to other classes.
      suggestionList - List of all Suggestion objects. Passed to other classes.
      Returns:
      SessionStatus to determine the state CAMs will continue with
